samples.question: Not like about it?

Yeah. well that sort of leads naturally into the next topic, which is public transportation. there is a few questions.

samples.question: Do people use, usually use public transportation in your country?
samples.transcript: A lot Cause I would say Korea has a great infrastructure especially public transportation system So a lot of people commute by especially subway So if I whenever I go to work I also use subway So there like a lot of people So I am kind of stuck in the subway every morning So that a bad part But yes people use a lot of transportation systems and what kind of public transport do people in your country use the most? The most? just like I said right before, yeah, Subway. Cause we have over 20 lines. So it is really easy, it is really convenient to transfer like line to line. So I think like many people take Subway. and this sort of all leads naturally.

samples.question: What I want to change?

samples.question: And will you ride public transportation in the future?

samples.question: What do you usually do when you have days off?

samples.question: First of all, what benefits does public transport bring to the world?
samples.transcript: I think that public transport brings a lot of advantage for our society Firstly it can make the environment greener because the emissions can reduce by using public transport And secondly using public transport is a way to saving money because public transport is much more cheaper than old vehicles What qualities does a driver need to have? Well, I think that a driver must have a lot of characteristics. Firstly, they must be skilled enough to drive because they need to handle a lot of situations when they are driving. And the second one is that responsibility because they will not always be driving alone. So, they need responsibility for the people they carry in the car.

samples.question: Do you think the government should make it a rule for people to use public transport?
samples.transcript: I think it is hard to make it a rule for people using public transport because there are some situations that public transport is not work, especially in the emergency situation. So it is hard to afford them using public transport.
